full_summary:
## Victoria-Class Submariner Life-Saving Suits and Mounts Tender Notice
### Solicitation Information

* **Solicitation Number**: W8482-230558/B
* **Publication Date**: June 2, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: July 13, 2023 at 14:00
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of National Defence, 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2

### Tender Description

The Department of National Defence seeks a supplier to provide life-saving suits and mounts for Victoria-class submarines. The requirement includes the following items:

* 120 Submariner Life-Saving Suits, GSIN 4220 (NSN 20-0041467), to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt
* 60 Submariner Life-Saving Suits, GSIN 4220 (NSN 20-0041467), to be delivered to CFB Halifax
* 10 Resilient Utility Mounts, GSIN 5340 (NSN 99-5412553) to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt
* 11 Resilient Utility Mounts, GSIN 5340 (NSN 99-5412553) to be delivered to CFB Halifax

Suppliers who propose an equivalent or replacement product must provide the following information:

* Brand and model name
* Part number and CAGE code
* Or equivalent identifier for the proposed product

### Selection Criteria

The Crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers for this procurement. The selection criteria for this tender is based on the lowest price.

### Language of Presentation

Documents may be presented in either English or French.

### Tender Documents and Attachments

The tender document and attachments are available online at the following URL:

https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6077/w8482-230558-b---rfp.pdf
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6077/w8482-230558-b---annex-a.xlsx

For more information, please contact:
Aïcha Diallo
Aicha.Diallo@forces.gc.ca
(000) 000-0000

### Notice Type

This is a request for proposal, open to all qualified suppliers. The procurement method is traditional, and the trade agreements applicable to this tender include the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (C
